item.title: R to @OhNoJo23: Having no money probably contributed to the reasons why I didn’t go too :)
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval

item.title: R to @TX4Silver: Wish I went. So many parties I used to hear about outside of the North but I didn’t really venture out beyond the north of England- going to Blackburn from Ashton Under Lyne was a big enough adventure as a teenager
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval
item.description: Wish I went. So many parties I used to hear about outside of the North but I didn’t really venture out beyond the north of England- going to Blackburn from Ashton Under Lyne was a big enough adventure as a teenager

item.title: RT by @suddiraval: 33 years ago today since the Sunrise party in White Waltham that produced one of the Sun's greatest recruitment adverts for British youth.

item.title: R to @RyderDesignS8: Sorry I’m after ideas for specific tunes - thoughts I’ve had so far… Papua New Guinea, Skreems remix of La Roux, When Doves Cry, Let The Music Play Shannon, Hashim, this mortal coil, Whole Lotta Love… I know that’s a super random list but it’s kinda gotta have mainstream appeal
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval
item.description: Sorry I’m after ideas for specific tunes - thoughts I’ve had so far… Papua New Guinea, Skreems remix of La Roux, When Doves Cry, Let The Music Play Shannon, Hashim, this mortal coil, Whole Lotta Love… I know that’s a super random list but it’s kinda gotta have mainstream appeal

item.title: Looking for ideas (this is actually for “real work reasons, not just Twitter fun :)) you are putting an action packed video presentation together and the employer wants you to select the best (mainly action packed but also atmospheric) music. What would you choose? Any genre!
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval
item.description: Looking for ideas (this is actually for “real work reasons, not just Twitter fun :)) you are putting an action packed video presentation together and the employer wants you to select the best (mainly action packed but also atmospheric) music. What would you choose? Any genre!

item.title: Image
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval

item.title: Haha! What a laugh! played an open mic music night.The guy said “that’s never happened before” as the audience shouted “one more” and asked me to play another tune:) he asked me Q’s on stage what synths I had. They were such a lovely friendly crowd - thanks to all who came down x
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval
item.description: Haha! What a laugh! played an open mic music night.The guy said “that’s never happened before” as the audience shouted “one more” and asked me to play another tune:) he asked me Q’s on stage what synths I had. They were such a lovely friendly crowd - thanks to all who came down x

item.title: Note to self: never go out the night before a gig. Especially if you have a drink and barely drink anymore. Will not be doing that next week!
item.dc:creator: @suddiraval
